slide2.title: WHAT HAPPENED
lines: OpenAI has raised $10 billion in funding from Microsoft and other investors
The investment values OpenAI at $29 billion, a 290% increase from its previous valuation

slide1.headline: Tesla Announces 12% Layoffs
slide1.subtitle: Elon Musk cites economic uncertainty as the reason

slide2.title: WHAT HAPPENED
lines: Tesla has announced layoffs affecting 12% of its workforce, approximately 6,000 employees
The layoffs are due to economic uncertainty and the need to reduce costs, with a goal of saving $1.2 billion
The company will provide severance packages to affected employees, with an average payout of $50,000
Tesla plans to focus on its core business and reduce non-essential expenses by 15%

slide3.title: WHY IT MATTERS
lines: The layoffs highlight the challenges facing the tech industry, with 20% of companies planning to reduce their workforce
The move is expected to have a positive impact on Tesla's bottom line, with a 10% increase in profit expected

The company's stock price is expected to fluctuate, with a 5% increase in the next quarter

The layoffs will also lead to increased investment in automation and AI, with a 20% increase in AI-related spending expected
